channel.title: Please help!
channel.description: i have got a server (eudora-world) and i coded and everything i can go on myself on any ip but when i try to get my bro on which is 2 metres away from me it says error connecting to server i made him download client and change ip and everything what shall i do also i have tried 127.0.0.1. and and i clicked run on the source so i donna wats wrong -.-
